description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPurity and Emptiness:
Your {CLASS_Life} creatures and {RACE_Beacon} creatures always have {CONDNAME_BUFF_BERSERK}. When an enemy {CLASS_Life} creature would heal one of its allies, it heals one of your creatures instead.
name: Zealot's Lantern
